fields.hostname.help: The hostname of the mail server (for exemple "localhost" or "192.168.1.15").
fields.port.help: The port of the mail server (if unspecified, the port 25 will be used).
fields.username.help: The username to use to connect to the mail server.
fields.password.help: The password to use to connect to the mail server.
fields.tls.help: Tick if the SMTP server you are connecting to uses TLS.
fields.emailFrom.help: Specifies the From: header in notification emails (for example: noreply@company.com).
fields.recipient.help: The email address to send the test message to.

notify.updated: The mail server configuration has been updated.
